org.agreement_technologies.common.map_dtg

Interface DTGSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DTGSetImp

    public interface DTGSet
    DTGSet interface represents a set of Domain Transition Graphs (one DTG per variable).
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCache(int threadIndex)
      Clears the cache, which stores already computed paths for value transitions.
      void distributeDTGs(AgentCommunication comm, GroundedTask gTask)
      Distributes the public DTGs information among the other agents.
      DTG getDTG(GroundedVar v)
      Returns the Domain Transition Graph for the given variable
      DTG getDTG(java.lang.String varName)
      Returns the Domain Transition Graph for the given variable
